item.title: In the defence of performance
item.description: Defensive programming is a solid practice to adopt and I generally advocate that we do so but we have to be careful we are still getting the value we expect from the practice. Checking input for validity before we execute logic is common and aims to error out quickly before expending resources on something that will fail.
